events.name: ⟪Short Notice⟫ Combined ANNIVERSARY Party ⤑ RSVP www.hccug.org/rsvp-2018

group.name: Houston Google Cloud (aka GDG Cloud Houston)  {by HCCUG.org}

events.description:
GREAT NEWS — got an another room :-)

1⟹ RSVP here on Meetup
2⟹ AND select your FOOD preference at www.hccug.org/rsvp-2018
~ Noodles (Vegetarian),
~ Chicken (Kosher/Halal),
~ Beef Brisket (NOT Kosher/Halal)

!!!!! FOOD ALLERGIES !!!!!
In addition to Veg & Kosher/Halal — we have food options to accommodate those with ~ Gluten, Egg, Paprika, and Fava-beans ~ allergies

CELEBRATING our Houston Google Cloud User-Group/Meetup's 1st Anniversary with HCCUG.org's 10th Anniversary!

THANK GOOGLE & www.HybridDecisions.com for their sponsorship!
See www.HCCUG.org for ALL details regarding this Anniversary Party ~ NEW Venue & Date with FREE PARKING :-)

~ www.HCCUG.org
«±»

events.name: GoogleCloudStudyJam via HybridCloudLabs™⟫ in-person&online⟫ MUST APPLY@HCCUG.org

group.name: Houston Google Cloud (aka GDG Cloud Houston)  {by HCCUG.org}

events.description:
UPDATE: we now have the option to attend in-person or online/remote :-)

NOTE: RSVPs here/Meetup.com do NOT count as Meetup.com does NOT have what we need, therefore:

— please APPLY and SELECT your food choices at https://www.hccug.org/member-exclusive

— ONLY those who APPLY @ https://www.hccug.org/member-exclusive are ELIGIBLE to be notified/confirmed/etc.

— ONLY attendees with a CONFIRMED email will be admitted.

— WALK-INS may be turned away -OR- would need to PAY the full price via Credit Card only, depending on seat availability.

— ALL details, are on HybridCloudGroup.org/HCCUG.org

— LIFE-HAPPENS ... so, please check HCCUG.org BEFORE you come

Cheers, Admin ​«±»
